title: A letter from Colonell Harvie, to His Excellency Robert Earle of Essex. Novemb. 10. 1643. It is his Excellencies pleasure that this letter be forthwith printed. John Baldwyn, Secretary to his Excellency.
author: Harvey, Edmund, 1594-1673.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for John Wright in the Old-bailey,
